channel.title: Highscores doesn't showup personal Ranks. Repp++
channel.description:
Hey there, im not that good with php, so thats why i came here!
My highscore does showup the total rank, and the Skill ranks. But when you click on a player name it shows Level,Xp, But not rank.
How can i fix this? [IMG]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o630/bitchpk/rankproblem.png[/img]
Here are my 5 Php scrips: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/24802873/Hiscores%2520V1.1.1.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/24802873/Hiscores%2520V1.1.1.zip[/url]
Config.php / Hiscores.class.php / index.php / Personal.php / Skills.class.php Will post the script if u dont want to download them.
Will repp++ if u helped me ;)

item.title: Highscores doesn't showup personal Ranks. Repp++
